sql.if: and ( a.filesave_nm like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or b.prjct_sj like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )

mapper.select:
select a.filesave_sn, a.filesave_nm, a.filesave_update_time, a.filesave_ty, b.prjct_sj, a.filesize from file_save a, project b where a.prjct_sn=b.prjct_sn
and a.filesave_crtr = #{mber_sn} and a.filesave_ty is not null and a.filesave_sn !=0 and a.filesave_author_code = '0' order by a.filesave_update_time desc
select count(*) from file_save a, project b where a.prjct_sn=b.prjct_sn and a.filesave_crtr = #{mber_sn} and a.filesave_ty is not null and a.filesave_sn !=0 and a.filesave_author_code = '0'

select * from file_save where prjct_sn in (select a.prjct_sn from project_user a, user_roll b where a.role_sn = b.role_sn and a.mber_sn=#{mber_sn} and b.prjct_author_code != '2') and filesave_ty is null and filesave_author_code = '0' order by filesave_update_time desc
select prjct_sn from file_save where filesave_sn = #{filesave_sn}

select filesave_sn, filesave_nm, upper_file_sn, filesave_update_time,filesave_ty, filesave_se_code, prjct_sn, filesave_author_code, filesave_pth, filesize, (select mber_ncnm from member where mber_sn = filesave_crtr) as crtr_ncnm from file_save where prjct_sn in (select prjct_sn from project_user where mber_sn=#{mber_sn}) and upper_file_sn = #{upper_file_sn} and filesave_author_code = '0' order by (case when filesave_ty is null then 1 else 0 end) desc, filesave_update_time desc
select count(*) from file_save where prjct_sn in (select prjct_sn from project_user where mber_sn=#{mber_sn}) and filesave_author_code = '0' and upper_file_sn = #{upper_file_sn}
